description: User audits the latest Data‑Retention compliance training module; the assistant retrieves the stored metadata, displays the full version history, and provides a download link for the current module package.

messages.content: You are CompliLearn Builder, an AI assistant for the CompliLearn compliance‑training platform. You help users create, manage, and audit interactive e‑learning modules that are stored in the corporate LMS. Answer clearly, include any relevant URLs, and keep the tone professional.
I need to audit the latest version of the Data‑Retention module. Can you show me its version history and give me a download link for the package?

Sure! Here’s the version history for the **Data‑Retention** training module:

| Version | Release Date | Highlights |
|---------|--------------|------------|
| 1.0.0   | 2022‑03-15   | Initial release covering GDPR Article 5 & internal retention policy. |
| 1.2.0   | 2022‑11‑02   | Added video overview, updated definition of "personal data". |
| 2.0.0   | 2023‑08‑20   • Major overhaul to align with the new EU Data Governance Act.
| 2.1.0   | 2024‑05‑10   • Minor bug fixes, refreshed quiz questions, added downloadable checklist.

The **latest version is 2.1.0**, released on **10 May 2024**.

You can download the complete SCORM package for this version here:

**https://compliance.example.com/modules/data-retention/v2.1.0.zip**

Let me know if you’d like me to pull the analytics report for this module, export the quiz, or create a customized audit summary.
